attributes.action: Do NOT have a second EU Referendum - Majority of The British people have spoken!
attributes.additional_details:
Even The current Labour Leader, Jeremy Corbyn rejects the idea of a second EU ref.
BBC SOURCE:-  Labour leader Jeremy Corbyn rejected the idea of a second referendum, saying: "We have got to accept that decision''
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-eu-referendum-36629324

We must do divorce negations as quick as possible! to stop the  prolonged uncertainty. - NOTE - I am 20 years of age, Voted leave, thought about it good and hard, I have not changed my mind. I am very happy with the results
attributes.background: David Cameron, the former Prime Minister has also said their would not be a second referendum on the European Union - This petition calls the government to IGNORE and reject the proposal  of a SECOND EU Ref.
